attributes.action: Stop the building of retirement apartments on Kenn Rd Clevedon !
attributes.additional_details:
We As a community would rather see youth facilities or affordable housing built on this patch of land ...

Clevedon already has a mass of Retirement homes and we need something for a younger generation now ...
attributes.background:
McCarthy and Stone wants to develop apartments for people aged over 70 next to Tesco in Kenn Road.

The area currently houses vacant industrial units, but these would be demolished to make way for the 62-apartment development.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
